hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EWIS.EWIS_ID EWIS.EWIS_ORDER_NO EWIS.EWIS_LOGISTICNO_NO EWIS.EWIS_WORK_ORDER_NO EWIS.EWIS_ISSUE_TIME EWIS.EWIS_REMARK EWIS.CREATOR EWIS.CREATE_TIME EWIS.MODIFIER EWIS.MODIFY_TIME EWIS.REC_VER EWIS.REC_STATUS EWIS.ORG_ID EWIS.PM_CODE EWIS.TIME_ZONE from EO_WORK_ISSUE_SUCCEED EWIS where 1=1 <<and EWIS.EWIS_ID LIKE :ewisId>> <<and EWIS.EWIS_ORDER_NO like :ewisOrderNo>> <<and EWIS.EWIS_LOGISTICNO_NO like :ewisLogisticnoNo>> <<and EWIS.EWIS_WORK_ORDER_NO like :ewisWorkOrderNo>> <<and EWIS.EWIS_ISSUE_TIME LIKE :ewisIssueTime>> <<and EWIS.EWIS_REMARK like :ewisRemark>> <<and EWIS.CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<and EWIS.CREATE_TIME=:createTime>> <<and EWIS.MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<and EWIS.MODIFY_TIME=:modifyTime>> <<and EWIS.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<and EWIS.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<and EWIS.ORG_ID LIKE :orgId>> <<and EWIS.TIME_ZONE LIKE :timeZone>> <<and EWIS.PM_CODE LIKE :pmCode>>
